title: 光影mod问题
author: nm200215735
txt_content:
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000005ccc934b, pid=7468, tid=8028
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (7.0_67-b01) (build 1.7.0_67-b01)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (24.65-b04 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [atio6axx.dll+0xd8934b]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
这个错误报告是什么，怎么办

replies.author: OAO_miao
replies.txt_content: 看那个atio6axx.dll的名称 应该和显卡驱动有关 更新显卡驱动试试

replies.author: nm200215735
replies.txt_content:
OAO_miao 发表于 2014-12-17 13:50
看那个atio6axx.dll的名称 应该和显卡驱动有关 更新显卡驱动试试
用什么更，我用驱动精灵全更了都没用

replies.author: Maaaake
replies.txt_content:
如果N卡推荐上英伟达官网更新驱动
PS：鲁大师驱动只是基本驱动

replies.author: nm200215735
replies.txt_content:
Maaaake 发表于 2014-12-17 13:58
如果N卡推荐上英伟达官网更新驱动
PS：鲁大师驱动只是基本驱动
我家的是A卡

replies.txt_content:
